text:
if you put an InputStream, or a File object whose destination path name
contains space, % etc,
WebdavResource.getGetContentLength() returns wrong value. but you can get
the correct length value by WebdavResource.propfindMethod.
creator: yzyu@yahoo.com
ozeigermann@c1-fse.de
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8246 ***
